DefaultEvent.Description: The Modiste slowly opens her bloodshot eyes. A deep smile spreads across her face. "How refreshing," she croaks. "You have bested me... my Captain! Oh, to have had an opponent of your calibre in London. What rivals we could have been."
DefaultEvent.Name: A close brush with the ferryman

ChildBranches.Name: Assist the fallen Modiste
ChildBranches.Description: You have won. Time to get her to the surgeon.

DefaultEvent.Description:
The Modiste's serrated blade slices effortlessly through her flesh, opening her chest. Shatter her ribcage. Force it open with your hands, straining as the bones yield and crack.

How fragile her heart feels between your fingers. Even more fragile as you tear it from its cradle of fat and muscle.

This is your trophy now. You have earned it.
DefaultEvent.Name: A grisly prize

ChildBranches.Name: Finish off the Modiste
ChildBranches.Description: Cut her open. Take her heart.

Description: Her perfume is drowned out by... iron? Or copper?
Name: The Modiste Falls!
